verses.verse: 'Now <S%H2088>this<s%> is the <S%H8451>law<s%> of the <S%H817>guilt<s%> <S%H817>offering;<s%> it is <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy.<s%>

'In the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> they <S%H7819>slay<s%> the <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering<s%> they are to <S%H7819>slay<s%> the <S%H817>guilt<s%> <S%H817>offering,<s%> and he shall <S%H2236>sprinkle<s%> its <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>
'Then he shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> from it <S%H3605>all<s%> its <S%H2459>fat:<s%> the <S%H451>fat<s%> <S%H451>tail<s%> and the <S%H2459>fat<s%> that <S%H3680>covers<s%> the <S%H7130>entrails,<s%>

and the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3629>kidneys<s%> with the <S%H2459>fat<s%> that is on them, <S%H834>which<s%> is on the <S%H3689>loins,<s%> and the <S%H3508>lobe<s%> on the <S%H3516>liver<s%> he shall <S%H5493>remove<s%> with the <S%H3629>kidneys.<s%>

'And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6999>offer<s%> them up in <S%H6999>smoke<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar<s%> as an <S%H801>offering<s%> by <S%H801>fire<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> it is a <S%H817>guilt<s%> <S%H817>offering.<s%>

<S%H3605>'Every<s%> <S%H2145>male<s%> among the <S%H3548>priests<s%> may <S%H398>eat<s%> of it. It shall be <S%H398>eaten<s%> in a <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H4725>place;<s%> it is <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy.<s%>

'The <S%H817>guilt<s%> <S%H817>offering<s%> is like the <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H9128>offering,<s%> there is <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8451>law<s%> for them; the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H3722>makes<s%> <S%H3722>atonement<s%> with it shall <S%H1961>have<s%> it.

'Also the <S%H3548>priest<s%> who <S%H7126>presents<s%> <S%H376>any<s%> man's <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering,<s%> that <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H1961>have<s%> for himself the <S%H5785>skin<s%> of the <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he has <S%H7126>presented.<s%>

'Likewise, <S%H3605>every<s%> grain <S%H4503>offering<s%> that is <S%H644>baked<s%> in the <S%H8574>oven,<s%> and <S%H3605>everything<s%> <S%H6213>prepared<s%> in a <S%H4802>pan<s%> or on a <S%H4227>griddle,<s%> shall <S%H1961>belong<s%> to the <S%H3548>priest<s%> who <S%H7126>presents<s%> it.

'And <S%H3605>every<s%> grain <S%H4503>offering<s%> <S%H1101>mixed<s%> with <S%H8081>oil,<s%> or <S%H9164>dry,<s%> shall <S%H1961>belong<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> to <S%H376>all<s%> <S%H251>alike.<s%>
'Now <S%H2088>this<s%> is the <S%H8451>law<s%> of the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of <S%H8002>peace<s%> <S%H8002>offerings<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> shall be <S%H7126>presented<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

<S%H518>'If<s%> he <S%H7126>offers<s%> it by <S%H5921>way<s%> of <S%H8426>thanksgiving,<s%> then <S%H5921>along<s%> with the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of <S%H8426>thanksgiving<s%> he shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> <S%H2471>cakes<s%> <S%H1101>mixed<s%> with <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> <S%H7550>wafers<s%> <S%H4886>spread<s%> with <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and <S%H2471>cakes<s%> [of well] <S%H7246>stirred<s%> <S%H5560>fine<s%> <S%H5560>flour<s%> <S%H1101>mixed<s%> with <S%H8081>oil.<s%>

'With the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of his <S%H8002>peace<s%> <S%H8002>offerings<s%> for <S%H8426>thanksgiving,<s%> he shall <S%H7126>present<s%> his <S%H7133>offering<s%> with <S%H2471>cakes<s%> of <S%H2557>leavened<s%> <S%H3899>bread.<s%>

'And of this he shall <S%H7126>present<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> of <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H7133>offering<s%> as a <S%H8641>contribution<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> it shall <S%H1961>belong<s%> to the <S%H3548>priest<s%> who <S%H2236>sprinkles<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H8002>peace<s%> <S%H8002>offerings.<s%>

'Now [as for] the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of his <S%H8426>thanksgiving<s%> <S%H8002>peace<s%> <S%H8002>offerings,<s%> it shall be <S%H398>eaten<s%> on the <S%H3117>day<s%> of his <S%H7133>offering;<s%> he shall not <S%H5117>leave<s%> <S%H4480>any<s%> of it over <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H1242>morning.<s%>

'But <S%H518>if<s%> the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of his <S%H7133>offering<s%> is a <S%H5088>votive<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> a <S%H5071>freewill<s%> <S%H5071>offering,<s%> it shall be <S%H398>eaten<s%> on the <S%H3117>day<s%> that he <S%H7126>offers<s%> his <S%H2077>sacrifice;<s%> and on the <S%H4283>next<s%> <S%H4283>day<s%> what is <S%H3498>left<s%> of it may be <S%H398>eaten;<s%>

but what is <S%H3498>left<s%> <S%H3498>over<s%> from the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> on the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> shall be <S%H8313>burned<s%> with <S%H784>fire.<s%>

'So <S%H518>if<s%> <S%H4480>any<s%> of the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of his <S%H8002>peace<s%> <S%H8002>offerings<s%> should [ever] be <S%H398>eaten<s%> on the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> he who <S%H7126>offers<s%> it shall not be <S%H7521>accepted,<s%> [and] it shall not be <S%H2803>reckoned<s%> to his [benefit.] It shall be an <S%H6292>offensive<s%> <S%H6292>thing,<s%> and the <S%H5315>person<s%> who <S%H398>eats<s%> of it shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> his [own] <S%H5771>iniquity.<s%>

'Also the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> that <S%H5060>touches<s%> <S%H3605>anything<s%> <S%H2931>unclean<s%> shall not be <S%H398>eaten;<s%> it shall be <S%H8313>burned<s%> with <S%H784>fire.<s%> As for [other] <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> <S%H3605>anyone<s%> who is <S%H2889>clean<s%> may <S%H398>eat<s%> [such] <S%H1320>flesh.<s%>

'But the <S%H5315>person<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H398>eats<s%> the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of <S%H8002>peace<s%> <S%H8002>offerings<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> belong to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> in his <S%H2932>uncleanness,<s%> that <S%H5315>person<s%> shall be <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off<s%> from his <S%H9415>people.<s%>

'And <S%H3588>when<s%> <S%H5315>anyone<s%> <S%H5060>touches<s%> <S%H3605>anything<s%> <S%H2931>unclean,<s%> whether <S%H120>human<s%> <S%H2932>uncleanness,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> an <S%H2931>unclean<s%> <S%H929>animal,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H2931>unclean<s%> <S%H8263>detestable<s%> <S%H8263>thing,<s%> and <S%H398>eats<s%> of the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of <S%H8002>peace<s%> <S%H8002>offerings<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> belong to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> that <S%H5315>person<s%> shall be <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off<s%> from his <S%H9415>people.<s%>' "
Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1696>"Speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> 'You shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H2459>fat<s%> [from] an <S%H7794>ox,<s%> a <S%H3775>sheep,<s%> or a <S%H5795>goat.<s%>

'Also the <S%H2459>fat<s%> of [an <S%H2966>animal<s%>] which <S%H5038>dies,<s%> and the <S%H2459>fat<s%> of an animal <S%H2966>torn<s%> [by beasts], may be <S%H6213>put<s%> to <S%H3605>any<s%> other <S%H4399>use,<s%> but you must <S%H398>certainly<s%> not <S%H398>eat<s%> it.

'For <S%H3605>whoever<s%> <S%H398>eats<s%> the <S%H2459>fat<s%> of the <S%H929>animal<s%> from <S%H834>which<s%> an <S%H801>offering<s%> by <S%H801>fire<s%> is <S%H7126>offered<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> even the <S%H5315>person<s%> who <S%H398>eats<s%> shall be <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off<s%> from his <S%H9415>people.<s%>
'And you are not to <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H1818>blood,<s%> either of <S%H5775>bird<s%> or <S%H929>animal,<s%> in <S%H3605>any<s%> of your <S%H4186>dwellings.<s%>

<S%H3605>'Any<s%> <S%H5315>person<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H398>eats<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H1818>blood,<s%> even that <S%H5315>person<s%> shall be <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off<s%> from his <S%H9415>people.<s%>' "
Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1696>"Speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> 'He who <S%H7126>offers<s%> the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of his <S%H8002>peace<s%> <S%H8002>offerings<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> shall <S%H935>bring<s%> his <S%H7133>offering<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> from the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of his <S%H8002>peace<s%> <S%H8002>offerings.<s%>

'His own <S%H3027>hands<s%> are to <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H801>offerings<s%> by <S%H801>fire<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%> He shall <S%H935>bring<s%> the <S%H2459>fat<s%> with the <S%H2373>breast,<s%> that the <S%H2373>breast<s%> may be <S%H5130>presented<s%> as a <S%H8573>wave<s%> <S%H8573>offering<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

'And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6999>offer<s%> up the <S%H2459>fat<s%> in <S%H6999>smoke<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar;<s%> but the <S%H2373>breast<s%> shall <S%H1961>belong<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons.<s%>

'And you shall <S%H5414>give<s%> the <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H7785>thigh<s%> to the <S%H3548>priest<s%> as a <S%H8641>contribution<s%> from the <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> of your <S%H8002>peace<s%> <S%H8002>offerings.<s%>

'The one <S%H4480>among<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> who <S%H7126>offers<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H8002>peace<s%> <S%H8002>offerings<s%> and the <S%H2459>fat,<s%> the <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H7785>thigh<s%> shall be his as [his] <S%H4490>portion.<s%>

'For I have <S%H3947>taken<s%> the <S%H2373>breast<s%> of the <S%H8573>wave<s%> <S%H8573>offering<s%> and the <S%H7785>thigh<s%> of the <S%H8641>contribution<s%> from the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> from the <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> of their <S%H8002>peace<s%> <S%H8002>offerings,<s%> and have <S%H5414>given<s%> them to <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> and to his <S%H1121>sons<s%> as [their] <S%H2706>due<s%> <S%H5769>forever<s%> from the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

<S%H2088>'This<s%> is that <S%H4888>which<s%> is <S%H4888>consecrated<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and that <S%H4888>which<s%> is <S%H4888>consecrated<s%> to his <S%H1121>sons<s%> from the <S%H801>offerings<s%> by <S%H801>fire<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> in that <S%H3117>day<s%> when he <S%H7126>presented<s%> them to <S%H3547>serve<s%> as <S%H3547>priests<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

<S%H834>'These<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> to be <S%H5414>given<s%> them from the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that He <S%H4886>anointed<s%> them. It is [their] <S%H2708>due<s%> <S%H5769>forever<s%> throughout their <S%H1755>generations.<s%>' "

<S%H2088>This<s%> is the <S%H8451>law<s%> of the <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering,<s%> the grain <S%H4503>offering<s%> and the <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H9128>offering<s%> and the <S%H817>guilt<s%> <S%H817>offering<s%> and the <S%H4394>ordination<s%> <S%H4394>offering<s%> and the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of <S%H8002>peace<s%> <S%H8002>offerings,<s%>

<S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> at <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H5514>Sinai<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that He <S%H6680>commanded<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H7126>present<s%> their <S%H7133>offerings<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H5514>Sinai.<s%>
